command.sortTableNumericAscending: Sort Table Numeric Ascending (by current column)
command.sortTableNumericDescending: Sort Table Numeric Descending (by current column)
configuration.title: Markdown Table Buddy
configuration.fileExtensions: File extensions to treat as Markdown files (e.g., ['.md', '.mdx', '.markdown'])
configuration.compactTable.cellPadding: Add a space at the start and end of each cell content
configuration.compactTable.separatorPadd: Add a space at the start and end of separator row cells
configuration.compactTable.alignSeparato: Align separator row column widths with the header text widths
configuration.compactTable.keepSeparator: Preserve original separator length ratios (for Pandoc column width hints)
configuration.formatTable.cellPadding: Add a space at the start and end of each cell content
configuration.formatTable.separatorPaddi: Add a space at the start and end of separator row cells
configuration.formatTable.keepSeparatorR: Preserve original separator length ratios (for Pandoc column width hints)
configuration.rowNumbers.headerText: Header text for the row number column
configuration.rowNumbers.alignment: Alignment for the row number column
configuration.sort.keepHeaderRow: Keep header row in place when sorting
configuration.csv.hasHeader: Treat first row of CSV as header
configuration.csv.quoteStrings: When to quote strings in CSV output
configuration.csv.includeHeader: Include header row when converting to CSV
configuration.formatOnSave: Automatically format tables on save (respects each table's current mode: compact or formatted)
configuration.autoInsertColumnOnTab: Automatically insert a new column when pressing Tab at the last cell of any row
configuration.autoInsertRowOnEnter: Automatically insert a new row when pressing Enter in the last row
configuration.ignoreCodeBlocks: Ignore tables inside code blocks (``` or ~~~)
